'''''"The Peak"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|The Peak|text=The Peak &mdash; Mutant Species That Fell into the Volcano}} without letting it unleash Saurian Stomp during the challenge.
